Title: Relates to payment for contingency management programs
Summary: Relates to payment for contingency management programs that provide an incentive structure as a service for the treatment of a substance use disorder.
LawCode: Add ยง367-w, amd ยง366-d, Soc Serv L; amd ยง13-d, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the workers' compensation law, in relation to payment for contingency management programs
